body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Bright Beginnings Daycare Center support. My name is Stephen Torres, how can I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Stephen, my name is Hannah Rogers. I have some questions regarding my billing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course Hannah, I'll be happy to help with that. Can you please provide me with your account number and the billing period you are referring to?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is eight two seven four six and the billing period is February two zero two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Hannah. How can I assist further with your billing questions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm a bit surprised by the extra charges on my bill. Can you explain what they are for?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for any confusion, Hannah. Let me look into that for you. Could you also provide me with the last four digits of the credit card on file and your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, the last four digits of my credit card are three zero four zero, and my email address is hannah.rogers@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming, Hannah. I will investigate the extra charges and reach out to you shortly with an explanation. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Stephen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Hannah. Thank you for reaching out to Bright Beginnings Daycare Center support. Have a great day!
